category.name: Action Manager Daemon
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: TC_actionmgrd_sleep_minutes
preference.preference_description: Defines the number of minutes in the sleep period of the "actionmgrd" process daemon between the dispatching of Subscription events. Low values can be used when a large number of events are expected, or to ensure events are processed close to their scheduled time. Large values can be used if few events are expected and their execution time is of lower importance. Valid Values: Positive integer up to 1440 (the number of minutes in a 24-hour day).
